name: Pitch Black
text: Reward: Rune of Hagalaz. Darkness everywhere.

name: High Brow
text: Reward: Rune of Jera. Poop-themed items.

name: Head Trauma
text: Reward: Rune of Ehwaz. Tiny Planet + Soy Milk.

name: Darkness Falls
text: Reward: Rune of Dagaz. Start as Eve with many items.

name: The Tank
text: Reward: Rune of Ansuz. Start with Yum Heart and high HP.

name: Solar System
text: Reward: Rune of Perthro. Blindfolded, use orbitals.

name: Suicide King
text: Reward: Suicide King Card. IPECAC + My Reflection.

name: Cat Got Your Tongue
text: Reward: Rune of Algiz. Start as a hairball Guppy.

name: Demo Man
text: Reward: Rune of Berkano. Dr. Fetus + Bobby-Bomb.

name: Cursed!
text: Reward: Rune of Blank. Start with many cursed items.

name: Glass Cannon
text: Reward: Rules Card. Epic Fetus + high speed, 0 HP.

name: When Life Gives You Lemons
text: Reward: Lemon Mishap. Start with lemon items.

name: Beans!
text: Reward: Burnt Bean. Blindfolded, use beans only.

name: It's in the Cards
text: Reward: SMB Super Fan. Start with card items.

name: Slow Roll
text: Reward: Swallowed Penny. High damage, slow tears.

name: Computer Savvy
text: Reward: Robo-Baby 2.0. Lasers + Homing.

name: Waka Waka
text: Reward: Death's Touch. Anti-Gravity + Strange Attractor.

name: The Host
text: Reward: Technology .5. Use Spider Baby and flies.

name: The Family Man
text: Reward: Epic Fetus. Blindfolded with many familiars.

name: The Purist
text: Reward: Rune of Berkano. No item rooms.

name: XXXXXXXXL
text: Reward: Gold Hearts. Every floor is massive.

name: SPEED!
text: Reward: Get Out of Jail Free Card. 16 minute timer.

name: Blue Bomber
text: Reward: Gold Bombs. Blue Baby with Kamikaze.

name: PAY TO PLAY
text: Reward: Percs! Pill. Use coins as health/keys.

name: Have a Heart
text: Reward: Re-run. Health is constantly draining.

name: I RULE
text: Reward: Poker Chip. Everything is slowed down.

name: Brains!
text: Reward: Stud Finder. Use Bob's Brain only.

name: PRIDE DAY!
text: Reward: D1. Rainbow tears and items.

name: Onan's Streak
text: Reward: Kidney Stone. Missing a shot deals damage.

name: The Guardian
text: Reward: Blank Rune. Protect the punching bag.

name: Backasswards
text: Reward: Lazarus starts with more blood. Game in reverse.

name: April's Fool
text: Reward: Maggy starts with pill. Random items.

name: Pokey Venture
text: Reward: Poke Go. Friendly monsters.

name: Ultra Hard
text: Reward: Samson healthy. Hardest challenge.

name: Pong
text: Reward: Greed's Gullet. Spend HP for items.

name: Scat Man
text: Reward: Dirty Mind. Poop everywhere.

name: Bloody Mary
text: Reward: Beth's Faith. Bleed on every floor.

name: Baptism by Fire
text: Reward: Urn of Souls. Use fire to attack.

name: Isaac's Awakening
text: Reward: Spirit Sword. Zelda-themed.

name: Seeing Double
text: Reward: Strawman. Two characters at once.

name: Pica Run
text: Reward: Gulped Trinket. Eat trinkets for powers.

name: Hot Potato
text: Reward: Tainted Forgotten. Throw the bone.

name: Cantripped!
text: Reward: Reverse Cards. Use cards to fight.

name: Red Redemption
text: Reward: Red Key. Navigate the red rooms.

name: Delete This
text: Reward: TMTRAINER. Glitched items everywhere.
